title: John Mulaney | Lesbian Holiday Movies Perfect for the Hallmark Channel
description:
Late Night writer Jenny Hagel pitches a series of lesbian holiday films perfect for the Hallmark Channel.

Then, John Mulaney talks about The Sack Lunch Bunch, auditioning children for the show and explaining why he doesn’t want kids to be his young co-stars.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
